bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with yu 鬱① pent-up [qi]. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 11: 論曰：風瘙癮胗，其狀有 二，皆緣肌中有熱。若涼濕之氣折之，熱結不散，則成白胗。若因風邪 所折，風熱相搏，則成赤胗。赤胗得熱則劇，得冷則滅 , 熱氣鬱結於內， 故惡熱宜冷 , “The discourse states: wind itching and dormant papules have two appearances, with both of them originating from heat in the muscles. If it is affected by cool moisture, the heat will form nodes and cannot dissipate. As a result it forms white papules. If [the heat] is affected by wind evil, wind and heatstrike at each other, and this generates red papules. When red papules receive further heat, then they turn serious. If they receive cold, they vanish. When heat qi is pent-up with nodes in the interior, [patients] have an aversion to heat and should be treated with cold [medication]”.
